title: april 22: hitler’s defeat [hosted by: Noah Kahan] (with MisterWives)
description:
In this episode of 365 days with mxmtoon, guest host Noah Kahan talks about Hitler’s defeat. After, he’s joined by musical guest MisterWives. Listen to this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
